info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.releasephases

Class ConditionalCheckDependencySnapshotsPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.plexus.logging.AbstractLogEnabled
      • org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.AbstractReleasePhase
        • org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.CheckDependencySnapshotsPhase
          • info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.releasephases.ConditionalCheckDependencySnapshotsPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.ReleasePhase, org.codehaus.plexus.logging.LogEnabled

    @Component(role=org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.ReleasePhase.class,
           hint="conditional-check-dependency-snapshots")
public class ConditionalCheckDependencySnapshotsPhase
extends org.apache.maven.shared.release.phase.CheckDependencySnapshotsPhase
    Checks for SNAPSHOT dependencies in the reactor, but only if requested.
    Author:
    Ronald Jack Jenkins Jr.
